name: The Ball Maze
description:
This is a adventure game where you are a circle that has to dodge skulls, dodge saws, dodge spikes, fight bosses, solve puzzles, destroy blocks and enemies with power ups, and much more!.

Your goal: complete all the levels.

This game contains 40 levels,  and new levels will be released in future updates.

I wish you good luck in the 2 world :) (You will need it)
